LanguageData.Bion_Grunt.label: bion
LanguageData.Bion_Grunt.description: Mass produced, lobotomized, brainwashed and genetically modified, Federation Bions are xenohuman that designed for war. Technically, they are not human anymore.
LanguageData.Bion_Grunt_Meat.label: synthetic meat
LanguageData.Bion_Grunt_Corpse.label: bion corpse
LanguageData.Bion_Stalker.label: bion
LanguageData.Bion_Stalker.description: The 'stalker' model bion is specially designed for infiltration and spying. Nimble and silent, the stalker is not easy prey.
LanguageData.Bion_Stalker_Corpse.label: bion corpse
LanguageData.Bion_Federator.label: federator
LanguageData.Bion_Federator.description: The "Federator" Main Battle Mechsuit is a mechsuit model produced by Arms Dynamics. Developed as a heavy assault exosuit, the Federator's design has been compared to a main battle tank.
LanguageData.Bion_Federator_Corpse.label: federator corpse
LanguageData.Bion_Hulk.label: bion
LanguageData.Bion_Hulk.description: If you think peacekeepers are the worst kind of xenohuman abuse, you are wrong. Terribly wrong. Specially designed by the Federation's best gene engineers, the "vindicator" model bions form the peacemonger corps, the elite detachment of the FPC.
LanguageData.Bion_Hulk_Corpse.label: bion corpse
